attributes.action: ensure that agricultural, construction and any slow moving vehicle, not capable of 35mph, pull over into every layby or passing place!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Slow moving agricultural vehicles (tractors, JCB type vehicles etc) cause so much congestion, are a hazard due to the increased risk due to overtaking these vehicles and I suggest that these types of vehicle should have to pull off the highway at every layby/passing place to let the inevitable queue that has formed behind them to pass
